name: Wild Zebra Shorts
description:
Made of the softest Lycra you will ever lay your hands on, these little beauties are built for durability. Apart from somewhat confusing your child about what colour a zebra is, these shorts will be a hit on any little boy or girl!

Sizes 000-3 available

Fabirc: 80% Nylon Polyamide, 20% Spandex Elastane

Recommended care instructions: 
-Hand or machine wash in lukewarm water on gentle cycle 
-Do not use chlorine bleach on any fabric containing spandex 
-Rinse thoroughly 
-Drip dry. If machine dried, use low temperature

Designed and made in Australia

name: Birds of a Feather

name: Blurple Stripe Shorts
description:
Blurple stripe shorts are made from Australian made, designed and printed fabric and are a cotton/lycra blend so they have a great stretch, the cut sees them sitting just on the knee or below.

Sizes 0000-3 available

Recommended care instructions: 
-Cold machine wash 
-Line dry (do not tumble dry)

All leggings are hand cut and sewn so pattern placement may vary from pair to pair.

Designed and made in Australia
